item.title: Most Altcoins Are Built to Fail
item.description:
Most Altcoins Are Built to Fail

With more than 660 alternative currencies in existence today, according to CoinMarketCap.com, and only a few are popularly used, it begs the question to know whether these coins really had a target market or use in mind before they were created.

item.title: Ether Slumps, Ethereum Classic Surges 300%, Finds Support With Exchanges, Miners
item.description:
Ether Slumps, Ethereum Classic Surges 300%, Finds Support With Exchanges, Miners

Ethereum classic (ETC) has seen a rally in the last 24 hours, in a massive reversal of fortunes. Ethereum classic is a result of the forking of the Ethereum which, ironically, comes from a decision by the Ethereum foundation to fork Ethereum to try to restore the money lost in the DAO hacking incident earlier on.

item.title: First European-Regulated Bitcoin Product Launched by the Gibraltar Stock Exchange
item.description:
First European-Regulated Bitcoin Product Launched by the Gibraltar Stock Exchange

The Gibraltar Stock Exchange (GSX) announced the launch of BitcoinETI, an asset-backed Exchange Traded Instrument that is invested exclusively in Bitcoin, making it the first European-regulated product for the leading digital currency. The ETI is listed on GSX with the ticker BTCETI and is in the process of also being co-listed on Deutsche BÃ¶rse in the coming weeks.

item.title: Bitcoin's Killer Legal Win No One Noticed
item.description:
Bitcoin's Killer Legal Win No One Noticed

Bitcoin caught a very big break in legal land, and no one even noticed. While an admittedly small percentage of the Bitcoin world was busy ganging up on me for saying sensible, yet unorthodox things in my coverage...

item.title: Breakout Gaming Appoints Board of Directors Following Token ICO
item.description:
Breakout Gaming Appoints Board of Directors Following Token ICO

Breakout Gaming, the new blockchain-based gaming platform, has appointed a Board of Directors after the successful launch of several products, including Breakout Coin and BreakoutPvP. item.title: Venezuela's Inflation to Reach 1,600% in 2017, Spurring Demand for Bitcoin
item.description:
Venezuela's Inflation to Reach 1,600% in 2017, Spurring Demand for Bitcoin

The weakening economy of Venezuela under the regime of President Nicolas Maduro is forecast by the International Monetary Fund to reach a consumer-price inflation rate of 480 percent by the end of this year, and peak at 1,640 percent in 2017.

item.title: Can I sell Bitcoin as easily as I purchase it?
item.description:
Can I sell Bitcoin as easily as I purchase it?

Answer: Simple answer is yes. You can sell bitcoins as easily as you purchase it. I can see that you are from India so I'll answer it from Indian perspective. There are a lot of bitcoin services such as Zebpay, Unocoin, Coinsecure and BTXIndia which allow you to easily buy and sell bitcoins.

item.title: The Bitcoin Renaissance: Evangelism Through Art
item.description:
The Bitcoin Renaissance: Evangelism Through Art

In 2015, two artists wanted to fix the disconnect between Bitcoin and the general population. The Italian natives, Valentina Picozzi and Claudia Lagorio, started Also read: Interview With Bitcoin Graphic Artist Phneep Satoshigallery , which spreads the message of cryptocurrency through imagery, art, and wearables.
